00056 // CFaceDetectApp initialization

00058 BOOL CFaceDetectApp::InitInstance()
00059 {
00060         AfxEnableControlContainer();
00061 
00062         // Change the registry key under which our settings are stored.
00063         // TODO: You should modify this string to be something appropriate
00064         // such as the name of your company or organization.
00065         SetRegistryKey(_T("Local AppWizard-Generated Applications"));
00066 
00067         LoadStdProfileSettings();  // Load standard INI file options (including MRU)
00068 
00069         // Register the application's document templates.  Document templates
00070         //  serve as the connection between documents, frame windows and views.
00071 
00072         CSingleDocTemplate* pDocTemplate;
00073         pDocTemplate = new CSingleDocTemplate(
00074                 IDR_MAINFRAME,
00075                 RUNTIME_CLASS(CFaceDetectDoc),
00076                 RUNTIME_CLASS(CMainFrame),       // main SDI frame window
00077                 RUNTIME_CLASS(CFaceDetectView));
00078         AddDocTemplate(pDocTemplate);
00079 
00080         // Parse command line for standard shell commands, DDE, file open
00081         CCommandLineInfo cmdInfo;
00082         ParseCommandLine(cmdInfo);
00083 
00084         // Dispatch commands specified on the command line
00085         if (!ProcessShellCommand(cmdInfo))
00086                 return FALSE;
00087 
00088         // The one and only window has been initialized, so show and update it.
00089         m_pMainWnd->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00090         m_pMainWnd->UpdateWindow();
00091 
00092         //InitGlobalData();
00093 
00094         return TRUE;
00095 }
